channel.title: ros on Krishnakumar Chandran
channel.description: Recent content in ros on Krishnakumar Chandran

item.title: Autonomous vehicle end-to-end data management platform
item.description:
Highlights

  • Designed and Developed end-to-end robotics data management platform

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to develop an end-to-end robotics data management platform

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Lidar Tracking enhancement
item.description:
Highlights

  • Development and improved lidar tracking algorithm to handle steady state error in dynamic object states estimation

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to handle steady state error in very large dynamic object states

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Lidar segmentation enhancement
item.description:
Highlights

  • Development and improved lidar segmentation algorithm to handle very large objects such as airplanes

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to segment airplanes from Lidar point cloud

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Lidar to Thermal Camera extrinsic calibration
item.description:
Highlights

  • Estimated Lidar to Thermal camera extrinsic calibration matrix using autoware software

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to estimate Lidar to Thermal camera extrinsic calibration matrix

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: RGB Camera modeling for Fixed wing UAV
item.description:
Highlights

  • Equations are derived for camera attached to fixed wing uav and used for body frame to camera frame transformations
  • Equations are verified using MATLAB and Simulink simulations

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to model camera attached to fixed wing uav

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Dynamic object tracking using Deepsort
item.description:
Highlights

  • Adapted and enhanced Deepsort algorithm for tracking dynamic objects

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to track moving objects for autonomous vehicle using camera data

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Lidar to Lidar calibration
item.description:
Highlights

  • Estimated Lidar to Lidar extrinsic calibration matrix using autoware software

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to estimate Right Lidar to Left Lidar extrinsic calibration matrix

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Lidar to RGB Camera calibration
item.description:
Highlights

  • Estimated Lidar to RGB camera extrinsic calibration matrix using autoware software

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to estimate Lidar to RGB camera extrinsic calibration matrix

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Thermal Camera intrinsic calibration
item.description:
Highlights

  • Estimated Thermal camera intrinsic calibration parameters using open-cv python library

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to estimate Thermal camera intrinsic calibration parameters

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Flir Thermal Camera ROS grabber
item.description:
Highlights

  • Developed Flir Thermal camera grabber ros node for Perception stack

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to collect thermal data stream from hardware and publish it to rostopics, so that perception stack can used it for detecting thermally sensitive objects

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Estimation of geolocation using Sensor fusion of Camera, GPS and IMU sensor for fixed wing aircraft
item.description:
Highlights

  • Equations are derived for EKF using camera model and dynamics of fixed wing aircraft
  • Equations are verified using MATLAB and Simulink simulations
  • Estimation algorithm is developed in Python/C++ and simulated in gazebo environment

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to estimate geolocation of fixed wing aircraft

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Estimation of geolocation using Sensor fusion of Camera, GPS and IMU sensor for fixed wing aircraft
item.description:
Highlights

  • Equations are derived for simple yet powerful guidance model using dynamics of fixed wing aircraft
  • Guidance model control equations are tested in MATLAB and Simulink environment
  • Guidance model is implemented in Python/C++ and ROS and tested in Gazebo Environment

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to build controller using guidance model for fixed wing aircraft

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Estimation of states for autonomous fixed wing aircraft
item.description:
Highlights

  • Equations are derived for EKF using dynamics of fixed wing aircraft
  • Equations are verified using MATLAB and Simulink simulations for the scenarios of takeoff, cruise and landing
  • Algorithm implemented in Python/C++, ROS and tested in Gazebo environment

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to estimate states of the autonomous fixed wing aircraft

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Estimation of states for autonomous fixed wing aircraft
item.description:
Highlights

  • Equations are derived for EKF using dynamics of tiltrotor drone
  • Equations are verified using MATLAB and Simulink simulations for the scenarios of takeoff, cruise and landing
  • Algorithm implemented in Python/C++, ROS and tested in Gazebo environment

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to estimate states of the autonomous fixed wing aircraft

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Estimation of states for autonomous tiltrotor drone
item.description:
Highlights

  • Equations are derived for EKF using dynamics of tiltrotor drone
  • Equations are verified using MATLAB and Simulink simulations for the scenario of trajectory tracking

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to estimate states of the autonomous tilt rotor drone

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Graph SLAM for autonomous vehicle localization navigation
item.description:
Highlights

  • Demonstrated a simple graph based SLAM algorithm (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping)

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to build simultaneous localization and mapping for autonomous cars

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Path manager algorithm for fixed wing aircraft
item.description:
Highlights

  • Equations are derived for path manager to track multi waypoint navigation
  • Path manager algorithms are tested in MATLAB and Simulink environment
  • Path manager is implemented in Python/C++ and ROS and tested in Gazebo Environment
  • Algorithm tested in Hardware-in-loop testing

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to build path manager to track multiple waypoints for fixed wing aircraft

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Path tracking algorithm for fixed wing aircraft
item.description:
Highlights

  • Equations are derived for straight line and circular path tracking using dynamics of fixed wing aircraft
  • Path tracker control equations are tested in MATLAB and Simulink environment
  • Path tracker is implemented in Python/C++ and ROS and tested in Gazebo Environment
  • Algorithm tested in Hardware-in-loop testing

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to build straight line and circular orbit path tracker for fixed wing aircraft

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

item.title: Design and development of autopilot for controlling attitude and air-speed of fixed wing UAV
item.description:
Highlights

  • Equation of the motion is derived with 12 DOF, analyzed for stability and PID controllers are constructed for controlling roll, pitch, altitude, course, airspeed with throttle and airspeed with pitch, considering trim conditions. State machine is build for switching between different flying modes. Controller gains are tuned, and code implemented in python/C++ and tested with Gazebo simulation in ROS environment

Problem Statement

• Aim is to get elevator, aileron and throttle commands, for different flight conditions of fixed wing aircraft such as takeoff, climbing, cruise, and landing.

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion
